RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professor Associado do Instituto Mau de Tecnologia para ministrar as aulas de 'Gesto Empreendedora', 'Estratgias de Marketing' e 'Jogos de Empresas' para as turmas de engenharia e administrao de empresas.Docente contratado pelo Insper para ministrar a disciplina "Fundamentos de Marketing" na ps graduao para as turmas "Certificates" e "Master in Business Management".Mestre em Administrao de Empresas, Stricto Sensu, pela PUC-SP e "Full Time MBA" pela Warwick Business School, UK.Profissional com vinte e cinco anos de experincia em Marketing e Vendas, em empresas multinacionais. Conhecimento terico e prtico das mais importantes ferramentas de marketing bem como de variadas indstrias como: produtos de massa, bens durveis, servios, franquias e consultoria de empresas.Em 1997 ganhou bolsa de estudos Chevening do British Council para cursar o MBA em Warwick, Inglaterra.Conquistou para Disney Parks Resorts em out/2000 o Odyssey Award promovido pelo Travel Industry Association of America (TIA).Conquistou para o Burger King 2 prmios Colunistas So Paulo (ouro:Rdio, bronze: TV)Como mentor, orientou os grupos premiados no concurso EMPREENDA do Insper, em 2014 com o grupo campeo entre "alumnis" e em 2015 com o grupo vice campeo entre os graduandos.Ministra aulas e palestras sobre o tema Construo de Marcas em cursos de Graduao e Ps como a ESPM, Insper, Fundao Vanzolini, entre outras.Possui graduao em Engenharia Mecanica pelo Instituto Maua de Tecnologia (1986). Curso de extenso para graduados (CEAG) pela FGV (1989) e MBA pela Warwick Business School, da Inglaterra (1998).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Associante Teacher of Strategic Marketing and Entrepreneurship at Instituto Mau de Tecnologia for the engineering under graduates.Teacher of Strategic Marketing Fundaments at Insper for the students undertaking the "Certificates" and "Master in Business Management! courses. An enthusiastic and committed professional with comprehensive business, marketing, sales, and leadership knowledge. Extensive experience gained in multinational companies managing marketing tools across consumer goods, durable products, service sectors and franchised business. International experience in Europe and the U.S.A.Awarded an UK Foreign and Commonwealth Office scholarship administered by The British Council in Brazil to do the MBA in Warwick, England. Guest lecturer on the subject Building Brands in Universities and Post Graduate courses like ESPM,Insper, Fundao Vanzolini, etc.Holds a bachelor degree in Mechanical Engineering from Instituto Maua de Tecnologia (1986), post graduate course in Business Administration from Fundao Getlio Vargas (CEAG in 1989), MBA degree from Warwick Business School, UK (1998), Masters Degree (Stricto Sensu) from Pontificia Universidade Catolica de Sao Paulo, PUC-SP (2014).

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Criado em 2007 constitui-se numa associao civil sem fins lucrativos, com sede em So Paulo,
que atua em consonncia com o Estatuto da Criana e do Adolescente, Lei de Diretrizes e Bases,
Lei Orgnica da Assistncia Social e com os Parmetros Curriculares Nacionais (https://www.institutouno.org.br/o-instituto).

A ONG surgiu para fortalecer um movimento de vrias partes do mundo que tm o propsito de transformar definitivamente a educao atravs de princpios como o respeito, o ouvir, o sentir, o colaborar, o afeto, o amor.

O ponto de partida a alfabetizao de adolescentes e crianas em situao de vulnerabilidade social do nosso pas que j apresentam as dificuldades de aprendizagem prprias deste recorte da populao.

Aps o desenvolvimento de uma metodologia pedaggica prpria, o Instituto UNO comeou a atender esses jovens em abrigos pblicos e privados levando uma educao inovadora e extremamente efetiva.
Professor visitante para administrar as disciplinas "Pitch de Inovao" e "Storyteling & Pitching"

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: The Paradox between Consumerism and Sustainability How to approach the marketing professionals with this theme

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: RISUS. Journal on Innovation and Sustainability

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract

Much has been said these days about the World?s limited capacity to provide sustainable resources vis a vis the growing population's demand for goods and supplies in a planet of finite resources. According to the Living Planet Report, produced by the NGO World Wildlife Fund (WWF): ?At humanity's present rate of consumption, by 2030 we'll need the resources of two Earths just to survive long-term. There are really two options: start building another Earth, or drastically change our lifestyles. Which one is supposed to be easier?? The present article addresses this issue from the point of view of the marketing executives of big companies, responsible to lead the communication and growth strategies of those companies, often encouraging 'consumerism' to meet the profit and revenue growths. The idea was to understand if this topic is relevant to these professionals, hence their companies, and raise some hypotheses of how to approach this problem in order to provoke those companies to practice "conscious marketing". Going one step further, does the type of organizational paradigm in which the executive company acts should influence the way to approach this professional when conducting personal interviews to collect data? An initial analysis on the theory of how to develop market research questions to avoid bias and/or induced responses, will lead to the article conclusion of how to set up a questionnaire that will be taken into consideration in a near future, at the masters? thesis of the author.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: CONSCIOUS MARKETING: SEEDS FOR A NEW MARKETING CONCEPT TO DEAL WITH THE POTENTIAL CONFLICTS BETWEEN CONSUMERISM AND SUSTAINABILITY
